Translations.Text: Oebbi i Inuben fellawen s yill; ipcali, fellas, lbabuo, s lameo iS; a pnadim l$it iS. Amar a ppesnemrem
Inub fellawen s wayen akw illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt. Akw s$uoeS. S tidep, deg waya, d issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
Ini i wid iumnen ad semmeen i wid ur negguni ara ussan n Oebbi, iwakken ad Ikafi agdud $ef wayen keppben

Ni$ Nefka, i At Isoail, Tazmamt, uuwab, lambiyya. Noeeq iten s wayen ilhan. Nesmenyaf iten i imavalen

Sinna, Nebbwi k deg ubrid n Lameo. Ddu degs, ur teddu akked chawi n wid ur nessin

Twalav win irran lhawiyya s d oebbi is? Itelf it Oebbi, asali $uoeS. Iskweo as ul, timejjin, Irra yas aabouq af allen is. Anwa ara t inhun, deffir Oebbi? Day u la tesmektayem ara
Nnan: "i illan kan, d tudert nne$, di ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir. Ad a$ in$en kan d akud". £ef ayagi, ur sain kra n tmusni. Nitni $ilen kan

Ini: "Oebbi Issidir ikwen, sinna, Ineqq ikwen. Sinna a kwen Issemlil ass n tnekra, ur illi degs ccekk". Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
N Oebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ass ideg ara d ias yimir, ass nni, ad xesoen ucmiten

Wanag wid ijehlen: "day ur awen $oan ara issekniyen iW? Tesme$woem iman nnwen, tellam d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi nnan: "ih, lemaahda n Oebbi, d tidep; imir, ur degs ccekk", tennam: "ur neeoi d acu ay d imir; $uone$ d nnwaya kan, ur nepputebbet
Ad asen d vehoent tucmitin xedmen, ad asen izzi wayen i$ef ttihin
